comments.body:
It's missing this function: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/net/Inet6Address.html#getByAddress-java.lang.String-byte:A-java.net.NetworkInterface- 

Could you either add it or add its signature, commented out? Like we did for instance here: https://github.com/scala-native/scala-native/blob/master/javalib/src/main/scala/java/io/FileInputStream.scala#L79
